analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/8/0x5ccc4ff4b286c1c1cce05f5194e8c8b01cb7c80d.sol:
	Contract ETUToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/8/0x5ccc4ff4b286c1c1cce05f5194e8c8b01cb7c80d.sol#217)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/8/0x5ccc4ff4b286c1c1cce05f5194e8c8b01cb7c80d.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/8/0x5ccc4ff4b286c1c1cce05f5194e8c8b01cb7c80d.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/8/0x5ccc4ff4b286c1c1cce05f5194e8c8b01cb7c80d.sol#85) is not in mixedCase
